mapper.select: select p.product_id, p.venue_id, b.dict_item_name product_type, p.product_price , p.product_detail, p.total_time, p.product_level, p.start_time, p.end_time, p.consume_time from product p left join base_dict b on p.product_type = b.dict_id where p.venue_id = #{venueId}

select p.product_id, p.venue_id, b.dict_item_name product_type, p.product_price , p.product_detail, p.total_time, p.product_level, p.start_time, p.end_time, p.consume_time from product p left join base_dict b on p.product_type = b.dict_id where p.product_id = #{productId}
mapper.update: update product set product_flag = 1 where product_id = #{0};
mapper.sql: product_id, venue_id, product_type, product_price, product_detail, total_time, product_level, start_time, end_time, consume_time, product_flag
mapper.insert: insert into product (product_id, venue_id, product_type, product_price, product_detail, total_time, product_level, start_time, end_time, consume_time, product_flag) values (#{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{venueId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{productDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{consumeTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update product
venue_id = #{venueId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
product_type = #{productType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
product_price = #{productPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
product_detail = #{productDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
total_time = #{totalTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
product_level = #{productLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
consume_time = #{consumeTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_flag = #{productFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update product set venue_id = #{venueId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, product_type = #{productType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, product_price = #{productPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, product_detail = #{productDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_time = #{totalTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, product_level = #{productLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, consume_time = #{consumeTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_flag = #{productFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
